CustomField.formula: if(( (ispickval( Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c ,"Smart. North Europe " ) || ispickval(Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c,"Smart. & Core Elec. North Europe" ) || ispickval(Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c,"Other Div. North Europe" )) && Fatness__c = 2 && Backwatch__c = false),'Type A', if(( (ispickval(Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c,"Smart. North Europe " ) || ispickval(Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c,"Smart. & Core Elec. North Europe" ) || ispickval(Previous_BizDev__r.Team__c,"Other Div. North Europe" )) && Fatness__c = 1 && Backwatch__c = true),'Type B', 'No Type EL-LG'))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If no type assigned, Fatness and BackWatch NMO are wrongly populated
CustomField.label: OLD_BackWatch Onboarding Type
